name: Cryptid Crew: The Demo
description:
Excited to announce the demo's release on June 22! 

Story

You're a freshly-bitten werewolf who's embraced their monster life... but what kind of life is it without friends? Do some traveling, meet some cool monsters and cryptids, and even go on dates! Each section of this visual novel will add a new monster to your list of friends until you've got yourself a wicked cool crew. And then you can date them. So really, it's a win-win.

This demo is a little sneak peek into the upcoming visual novel and dating sim, Cryptid Crew. The full game has 10 main characters and depending on your choices, you can unlock a dating sim at the end. The demo features one of those dateables! 

Content advisory: The demo contains screen shakes and flashes. 

Features

  • a cute alien
  • a snarky demon
  • choices matter
    • different endings (2 endings, but many different ways you can get there)
